name: Shinto! Breakout
description:
Shinto! Breakout

Shinto! Breakout is a simple, but fast paced and skill based Breakout Game with a stylized asian theme.

  • Precise ball controll with the curved paddle
  • Two different types of power-ups
  • 50 level with different styles, blocks and difficulties

I created Shinto! Breakout to learn more about game development and it was overall a great journey for me. And while it is a simple game, it is although tons of fun and quite goodlooking. Because of that i decided to share this game with all of you.

Finally there is a lot of room for new features like high scores, additional level or power ups etc. So if you enjoy this game or have any ideas, let me know. I would love to update this game when people are enyoing it.

Greetings,

Neglli

Updates:

22.07.16 - Some minor bugfixes.

06.08.16 - Improved collision detection.
